name: Transylvania Open
description:
Witness the most blood chilling tennis event of the century!

Nosferatu vs. Dracula - the clash of the titans that will once and for all settle who is the true Lord of the Darkness. It's "all or nothing" for these sport veterans, so grab a crucifix, sprinkle on some holly water and enjoy this elegant struggle to the death.

Controls:

Player 1 - Arrows to move "," and "." (comma and dot) to backhand and forehand

Player 2 - WASD to move, G and H for backend and forehand.

(or you can just use gamepads, which is much nicer)

Music by Joe Esposito and Jakub Marszałkowski (thanks:)

Check other games at

http://forgottenlaundry.com

http://m.blackmoondev.com
